com.qtfx.lib.task.file

Class FileCopy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask<java.lang.Void>
      • com.qtfx.lib.task.Task
        • com.qtfx.lib.task.file.FileCopy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>

    public class FileCopy
extends Task
    Utility class to copy files from a list of source directories to a list of destination directories.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
